title: Statement by Minister Aso on the publication of the final reports on BEPS Action Plan ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Finance of the State of Japan ) Following the Action Plan on Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) developed by the OECD Committee on Fiscal Affairs (chaired by Mr Masatsugu Asakawa , Vice Minister of Finance for
